text:
="preserve">Paul Matters (died) was an Australian musician. He served as a bassist of rock band DC in 1975. He joined the group after their first album "High Voltage". He was sacked by AC/DC singer Bon Scott weeks after joining the group and replaced by Mark Evans.
Little is known to the public about Matters' life after being sacked by AC/DC. His death was announced in October 2020.
